original_text: And this is the fashion which thou shalt make it of: The length of the ark shall be three hundred cubits, the breadth of it fifty cubits, and the height of it thirty cubits.
korean_text: 네가 만들 방주는 이러하니 그 길이는 삼백 규빗, 너비는 오십 규빗, 높이는 삼십 규빗이라

sentences.original_text: which thou shalt make it of
The length of the ark shall be three hundred cubits
sentences.korean_translation: 방주의 길이는 삼백 규빗이 될 것이요

sentences.original_text: the breadth of it fifty cubits
and the height of it thirty cubits
